description: REDEVELOPMENT OF SITE FOR A MIXED USE DEVELOPMENT IN THREE LINKED BLOCKS COMPRISING 64 RESIDENTIAL UNITS (37 ONE- BEDROOM, 18 TWO-BEDROOM AND 9 THREE- BEDROOM) WITH ASSOCIATED BASEMENT CAR AND CYCLE PARKING AND AMENITY SPACE AND 2 RETAIL UNITS WITH ANCILLARY STORAGE FRONTING PINNER ROAD AND CYCLE PARKING.
